title: GIGIZAZA Gold Velvet Decorative Throw Pillow Covers,18x18 Pillow Covers for Couch Sofa Bed 2 Pack Soft Cushion Covers

Made from 100% velvet, these pillow covers are not only soft and comfortable but also exude sophistication with their gold color. The 18x18 size makes them perfect for your couch, sofa, or bed, and the invisible zipper closure ensures a seamless look.

These pillow covers come in a pack of 2 and are designed to fit 18x18 or 20x20 inch inserts. Whether it's for your living room, bedroom, office, or even your car, these covers are versatile and stylish. Plus, they are machine washable for easy care, with cold water and low drying temperature recommended.
